Package vista.gui

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Changeable
    Informs an object that implements this interface that OK, Cancel or Apply button is pressed.
    Command
    The command interface for uniformizing access to application functionality.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ArrowIcon  
    BlankIcon  
    ComboMenuBar  
    ComboMenuBar.ComboMenu  
    CursorChangeListener
    This class changes the cursor of the source of the fired event to WAIT_CURSOR and then changes it back to the old cursor once the operation finishes.
    DialogButtonPanel
    Takes care of creating a panel with OK, Cancel, and Apply buttons.
    DocumentOutputStream
    An OutputStream implementation that places it's output in a swing text model (Document).
    DocumentWriter
    An Writer implementation that places it's output in a swing text model (Document).
    ExcelAdapter
    ExcelAdapter enables Copy-Paste Clipboard functionality on JTables.
    ExtensionFilter  
    FramelessIcon
    A display of the start up icon window
    GenericActionAdapter
    A action listener which uses reflection to invoke a callback on the given method in given object's class.
    JDBCAdapter  
    MacroCommand
    A macro command is a command which executes a list of commands in a certain order as defined by the order of addition.
    SwingWorker
    An abstract class that you subclass to perform GUI-related work in a dedicated thread.
    SystemConsole
    A display area for console output.
    TableCellAction
    A class that listens to mouse clicks on a table's header and forwards them to an action
    TableCellColorEditor  
    TableCellColorRenderer  
    TableCellToolTip
    This class displays a window when the mouse is positioned on the cell of a JTable
    TableHeaderAction
    A class that listens to mouse clicks on a table's header and forwards them to an action
    TableMap  
    TableSorter  
    TableUtils  
    VistaMetalTheme
    This class describes the default Metal Theme.
    VistaUtils
    Encapsulates commonly needed functionality.
    WorkerActionListener
    A class that uses SwingWorker to do the work in a thread so as to allow updates to the components
    XYGridLayout
    Defines the interface for classes that know how to layout Containers.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    ExecutionException
    Exception super class for all exceptions thrown by all commands.
    VistaException
    A runtime exception to catch exeptions and rethrow them as run time exceptions
